fields.description: Use 1 for paragraph x.1, 1.1 for x.1.1, etc.
fields.label: Paragraph Number

fields.description:
Text of paragraph, note that use of curly brackets for
{employee_name}, {date_of_joining}, {company}, {employee_number}, {designation}, {current_address}, {start_date}, {end_date}, {custom_id_number}, {project} and {branch}, will result in fields being populated from Form.
fields.label: Paragraph Text
